form.label: MITRE ATT&CK Matrix
form.description: This dashboard provides an overview of triggered tactics and techniques based on enabled correlation rules with related MITRE ATT&CK annotations.

search.query: | inputlookup mitre_all_rule_technique_lookup.csv | lookup mitre_tt_lookup.csv technique_id | fields rule_name, technique_name | join rule_name [ search `notable_by_id("*")` | rename search_name as rule_name | fields rule_name, urgency | lookup urgency_score.csv urgency | stats max(score) as max_score, count by rule_name] | stats sum(count) as triggered_count list(rule_name) as rule_name_list, max(max_score) as max_score by technique_name delim=";" | nomv rule_name_list

| join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Collection", triggered_count as "Collection Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Collection Rule Name List", max_score as "Collection Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Collection","Collection Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Collection Attack Count", "Collection Max Score" | eval "Collection"='Collection'. "|" .'Collection Attack Count'. "|" .'Collection Rule Name List'. "|" .'Collection Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Command And Control" , triggered_count as "Command And Control Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Command And Control Rule Name List", max_score as "Command And Control Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Command And Control","Command And Control Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Command And Control Attack Count", "Command And Control Max Score" | eval "Command And Control"='Command And Control'. "|" .'Command And Control Attack Count'. "|" .'Command And Control Rule Name List'. "|" .'Command And Control Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Credential Access" , triggered_count as "Credential Access Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Credential Access Rule Name List", max_score as "Credential Access Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Credential Access","Credential Access Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Credential Access Attack Count", "Credential Access Max Score" | eval "Credential Access"='Credential Access'. "|" .'Credential Access Attack Count'. "|" .'Credential Access Rule Name List'. "|" .'Credential Access Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Defense Evasion" , triggered_count as "Defense Evasion Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Defense Evasion Rule Name List", max_score as "Defense Evasion Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Defense Evasion","Defense Evasion Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Defense Evasion Attack Count", "Defense Evasion Max Score" | eval "Defense Evasion"='Defense Evasion'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Attack Count'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Rule Name List'. "|" .'Defense Evasion Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Discovery" , triggered_count as "Discovery Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Discovery Rule Name List", max_score as "Discovery Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Discovery","Discovery Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Discovery Attack Count", "Discovery Max Score" | eval "Discovery"='Discovery'. "|" .'Discovery Attack Count'. "|" .'Discovery Rule Name List'. "|" .'Discovery Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Execution" , triggered_count as "Execution Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Execution Rule Name List", max_score as "Execution Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Execution","Execution Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Execution Attack Count", "Execution Max Score" | eval "Execution"='Execution'. "|" .'Execution Attack Count'. "|" .'Execution Rule Name List'. "|" .'Execution Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Exfiltration" , triggered_count as "Exfiltration Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Exfiltration Rule Name List", max_score as "Exfiltration Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Exfiltration","Exfiltration Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Exfiltration Attack Count", "Exfiltration Max Score" | eval "Exfiltration"='Exfiltration'. "|" .'Exfiltration Attack Count'. "|" .'Exfiltration Rule Name List'. "|" .'Exfiltration Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Impact" , triggered_count as "Impact Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Impact Rule Name List", max_score as "Impact Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Impact","Impact Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Impact Attack Count", "Impact Max Score" | eval "Impact"='Impact'. "|" .'Impact Attack Count'. "|" .'Impact Rule Name List'. "|" .'Impact Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Initial Access" , triggered_count as "Initial Access Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Initial Access Rule Name List", max_score as "Initial Access Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Initial Access","Initial Access Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Initial Access Attack Count", "Initial Access Max Score" | eval "Initial Access"='Initial Access'. "|" .'Initial Access Attack Count'. "|" .'Initial Access Rule Name List'. "|" .'Initial Access Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Lateral Movement" , triggered_count as "Lateral Movement Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Lateral Movement Rule Name List", max_score as "Lateral Movement Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Lateral Movement","Lateral Movement Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Lateral Movement Attack Count", "Lateral Movement Max Score" | eval "Lateral Movement"='Lateral Movement'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Attack Count'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Rule Name List'. "|" .'Lateral Movement Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Persistence" , triggered_count as "Persistence Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Persistence Rule Name List", max_score as "Persistence Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Persistence","Persistence Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Persistence Attack Count", "Persistence Max Score" | eval "Persistence"='Persistence'. "|" .'Persistence Attack Count'. "|" .'Persistence Rule Name List'. "|" .'Persistence Max Score' | join type=left [| loadjob $subsearch_id$ | rename technique_name as "Privilege Escalation" , triggered_count as "Privilege Escalation Attack Count", rule_name_list as "Privilege Escalation Rule Name List", max_score as "Privilege Escalation Max Score" ] | fillnull value="NULL" "Privilege Escalation","Privilege Escalation Rule Name List" | fillnull value=0 "Privilege Escalation Attack Count", "Privilege Escalation Max Score" | eval "Privilege Escalation"='Privilege Escalation'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Attack Count'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Rule Name List'. "|" .'Privilege Escalation Max Score'

| stats sum("Initial Access Attack Count") as initial_access_sum, sum("Execution Attack Count") as execution_sum, sum("Persistence Attack Count") as persistence_sum, sum("Privilege Escalation Attack Count") as privilege_escalation_sum, sum("Defense Evasion Attack Count") as defense_evasion_sum, sum("Credential Access Attack Count") as credential_access_sum, sum("Discovery Attack Count") as discovery_sum, sum("Lateral Movement Attack Count") as lateral_movement_sum, sum("Collection Attack Count") as collection_sum, sum("Command And Control Attack Count") as command_and_control_sum, sum("Exfiltration Attack Count") as exfiltration_sum sum("Impact Attack Count") as impact_sum, max("Initial Access Max Score") as initial_access_max_score, max("Execution Max Score") as execution_max_score, max("Persistence Max Score") as persistence_max_score, max("Privilege Escalation Max Score") as privilege_escalation_max_score, max("Defense Evasion Max Score") as defense_evasion_max_score, max("Credential Access Max Score") as credential_access_max_score, max("Discovery Max Score") as discovery_max_score, max("Lateral Movement Max Score") as lateral_movement_max_score, max("Collection Max Score") as collection_max_score, max("Command And Control Max Score") as command_and_control_max_score, max("Exfiltration Max Score") as exfiltration_max_score, max("Impact Max Score") as impact_max_score | eval "Initial Access"=initial_access_sum."|".initial_access_max_score, "Execution"=execution_sum."|".execution_max_score, "Persistence"=persistence_sum."|".persistence_max_score, "Privilege Escalation"=privilege_escalation_sum."|".privilege_escalation_max_score, "Defense Evasion"=defense_evasion_sum."|".defense_evasion_max_score, "Credential Access"=credential_access_sum."|".credential_access_max_score, "Discovery"=discovery_sum."|".discovery_max_score, "Lateral Movement"=lateral_movement_sum."|".lateral_movement_max_score, "Collection"=collection_sum."|".collection_max_score, "Command And Control"=command_and_control_sum."|".command_and_control_max_score, "Exfiltration"=exfiltration_sum."|".exfiltration_max_score, "Impact"=impact_sum."|".impact_max_score | table "Initial Access" "Execution" "Persistence" "Privilege Escalation" "Defense Evasion" "Credential Access" "Discovery" "Lateral Movement" "Collection" "Command And Control" "Exfiltration" "Impact"
